name: Heart Attack [Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2]
description:
Heart Attack is a game made for the Brackeys 2021.2 Game Jam! To fit with the theme of Let There Be Chaos, Heart Attack centres around you playings as a lone T-cell, defending a heart from invasion by Bacteria and Viruses. You'll need to search around the cavity to look for invaders and dispatch them using antibodies. There's also a rather suspicious looking RNA strand who may be able to sell you stronger genes...

Having trouble on Safari? Try another web browser, Safari seems to have issues loading the game.

Glass Mode makes it so the Heart can only withstand 1 hit, for an extra challenge!

Made By
CreatedBySeb - Programming, Game Design
XtremeXavier - Art

Additional Credits
Background Music: "Bleeping Demo" by Kevin MacLeod https://incompetech.com/
Pop Effect: "Pop, Low, A (H1)" by InspectorJ https://www.jshaw.co.uk from https://freesound.org
